name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: A classic Italian dish made with spaghetti pasta and a rich meat sauce.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A fresh and flavorful salad made with grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

name: Beef Stroganoff
description: A hearty and comforting dish made with tender beef strips and a creamy mushroom sauce.

name: Greek Salad
description: A light and refreshing salad made with cucumber, tomato, red onion, and feta cheese.

name: Beef Tacos
description: A fun and flavorful Mexican dish made with seasoned ground beef and toppings like avocado and salsa.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: A creamy and indulgent Italian rice dish made with mushrooms and parmesan cheese.
